mapper.insert: INSERT INTO branch(code, name, type, status, create_time, create_user_id, last_update_time, last_update_user_id) VALUES (#{code}, #{name}, #{type}, #{status}, #{create_time}, #{create_user_id}, #{last_update_time}, #{last_update_user_id})
mapper.update: UPDATE branch SET code = #{code}, name = #{name}, type = #{type}, status = #{status}, create_time = #{create_time}, create_user_id = #{create_user_id}, last_update_time = #{last_update_time}, last_update_user_id = #{last_update_user_id}, deleted = #{deleted} WHERE id = #{id}
